summary: SummaryThe NARS Light Reflecting Luminizing Powder is a high-performance highlighter that provides an ethereal, radiant sheen with 10-hour wear.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides an ethereal, radiant sheen anywhere you want to reflect light - including cheekbones, brow bones, and down the center of the nose.Innovative, serum-powder hybrid texture provides a sensorial feel that melts seamlessly into skin, blends effortlessly, and builds weightlessly for a soft to intense glow.Water- and sweat-resistant formula with 10-hour wear across five lustrous shades.Features Light Reflecting Complex to optimize light reflection on skin for a soft-focus effect.FeaturesLuminous finish10-hour wearWater- & sweat-resistantSensorial gel-powder hybridSafe for use on eyeKey IngredientsGOLDEN SEAWEED EXTRACT: A soothing brown algae that hydrates skin and reinforces the skin lipidic barrier, creating a smoothing effect on skin.NATURAL MICA: Provides a silky touch and seamless blendability while amplifying skin's luminosity.Item 2639228How To UseSubtle Glow:Use #16 Blush Brush to sweep Light Reflecting Luminizing Powder along cheekbone and blend toward hairline with emphasis on the high point of the cheek.Instant Glow Boost:Use #15 Precision Powder Brush to apply to tops of cheekbones. Use tip of brush to sweep down center of the nose and lightly brush onto cupid's bow.To dial up the glow, apply in a 'C' shade from cheekbone blending above the brow bone, then apply the remainder below the brow bone.Radiant Glow:Gently buff Blush onto cheeks using sweeping circular motions for a rush of natural color.Use Yachiyo Kabuki Brush to apply Light Reflecting Luminizing Powder over tops of cheekbones in targeted back and forth motion to add a surge of shine.IngredientsSynthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dehydroacetic Acid, Laminaria Ochroleuca Extract, Lauroyl Lysine, Tocopherol, Tin Oxide, [+/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Subtle Glow:Use #16 Blush Brush to sweep Light Reflecting Luminizing Powder along cheekbone and blend toward hairline with emphasis on the high point of the cheek.Instant Glow Boost:Use #15 Precision Powder Brush to apply to tops of cheekbones. Use tip of brush to sweep down center of the nose and lightly brush onto cupid's bow.To dial up the glow, apply in a 'C' shade from cheekbone blending above the brow bone, then apply the remainder below the brow bone.Radiant Glow:Gently buff Blush onto cheeks using sweeping circular motions for a rush of natural color.Use Yachiyo Kabuki Brush to apply Light Reflecting Luminizing Powder over tops of cheekbones in targeted back and forth motion to add a surge of shine.

reviews.headline: Pigmented and glowy ‚ú®
reviews.comments: Finally, a highlighter that has bold color ( but not too much ) and the right amount of shimmer. This one, HEAVENLY, really does have a rose gold shade on your face. It isn't pale and colorless. It has a golden, rosy shimmer that I like. I purchased this highlighter to wear under O blush. This gives the blush the pinky shimmer the old formula had!

reviews.headline: Beautiful, Strong Highlight
reviews.comments: This product is truly amazing - an intense high-shine, blinding highlighter that looks wet. The only issue I have is how delicate the powder actually is, so it will easily break if dropped!

reviews.headline: Gives a good shine
reviews.comments: I have a hard time with highlighters but i found this one to be the best!

reviews.headline: Beautiful!
reviews.comments: I have Eros and Heavenly. These have a feel like they are almost a creamy powder. Super glowing highlight, can be subtle if you want, but I love this as a full on highlighter. With setting spray, these melt into my makeup so gorgeous. So worth the price, I want every color. The packaging is super slim and I love that.

reviews.headline: Awesome!
reviews.comments: At last, a beautiful talc-free luminizing powder.  Purchased Ophelia, and it is beautiful on my skin! Will definitely repurchase.

reviews.headline: Awesome highlighter!!
reviews.comments: I just got the Electra shade, I'm in love ‚ù§Ô∏è with it, it's buildable, it can be as soft or as strong as you want, honestly even some women looked at me in a store, you know when you look good , that look like wanting to ask what are wearing

reviews.headline: best highlighter add my makeup routine
reviews.comments: One the beautiful pigmented and super glow is This, also the texture so soft and silky,perfect for summer time even using as eyeshadow too and looks fantastic , also i love the packaging too, I highly recommend ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è

reviews.headline: Gwp turned into fav
reviews.comments: This is by far the best product that i received in gwp. It is not chunky. It shows up on skin like real shine. The best highlighter so far.

reviews.headline: Really beautiful formula!
reviews.comments: I bought this highlighter in Heavenly (rose gold), and it's beautiful on my light-medium skin with yellow undertones. The formula is a winner. It's silky and soft. A little goes a long way. Best of all, I dropped it but it didn't shatter!

reviews.headline: My new favorite highlighter
reviews.comments: I love everything from NARS and this product is no different. I love it and it's my new go-to highlighter. And, because of the light pink shade I chose, I don't even need to add a blush with it.

reviews.headline: Beautiful
reviews.comments: I have Eros and heavenly, both look nice on my light-med skin... no glitter or particles to be seen, just shiny reflective highlight. If you love high end glow products, this is for you

reviews.headline: Love this highlighter
reviews.comments: Love the texture of these highlighters. Ethereal and beautiful. Radiant and glowy.

reviews.headline: Best highlighter in years
reviews.comments: This is thhe best highlighter that has came out in years! Definitely repurchasing.

reviews.headline: so pretty
reviews.comments: I haven't actually bought it, but I swatched it in store and it's so beautiful. It's super smooth and not chunky at all. Definitely going to buy on my next makeup run.

reviews.headline: Very unnatural and glittery
reviews.comments: If you're looking for a natural highlight, this is not it. I got the lightest shade & it looks like straight glitter. There's no background color, just chunks of silver glitter. Not recommended unless you're doing to a club or festival.

reviews.headline: Get this product!
reviews.comments: Felt so soft and light on the skin tried it on in-store and can't wait for mine to try. Orphelia is perfect for darker skin tones

reviews.headline: Gorgeous Highlighter
reviews.comments: This is amazing! Oh my goodness. It makes me look healthy is the best way to describe it. I use it just under the lowerlash line in the center and the brow area and it lights up my eyes and makes them look brighter.

media.headline: Obsessed With This Glow
media.caption: Ophelia is THAT bronzed gold glow ‚ú®üåô

media.headline: Love this highlighter!!
media.caption: Love how it brightens my face!

faceoff_positive.comments: I received the NARS Light Reflecting Luminizing Powder in the shade Ophelia for free in exchange for my honest review, and I have to say it's such a beautiful product. The compact feels sleek and polished. I love the clean look of the white packaging even though I've always been used to NARS's classic black. It has a chic vibe that looks really nice on my vanity. The powder itself is so silky soft, and it blends into the skin like butter without feeling heavy or chalky. Ophelia is a gorgeous bronzed gold that works perfectly with my light medium / warm olive skin tone, but I can definitely see it being flattering on a wide range of complexions. I've worn it mainly as a highlight on my cheekbones for that glowy, lit-from-within look, but it also looks stunning on the eyelids as an eyeshadow. It gives more of a luminous, reflective finish than a subtle one, but I love how it's buildable so you can keep it soft for daytime or layer it for extra glow at night. What stood out to me most is how seamlessly it melts into the skin and lasts throughout the day without fading or looking patchy. Compared to other highlighters I've used, this one feels lighter and smoother. If you're into a golden glow that feels versatile and polished, this is definitely a product worth trying.
faceoff_positive.headline: Obsessed With This Glow

faceoff_negative.comments: If you're looking for a highlighter, this one will do the job, but don't expect anything extraordinary. The NARS Light Reflecting Luminizing Powder comes in slim, sleek packaging and the rose gold shade is quite pretty. However, the formula itself feels fairly standard. I wore it for a night out with friends, and while it gave a nice initial glow, it didn't last through the evening. Overall, it's decent but not a must-have.
faceoff_negative.headline: Decent Highlighter But Nothing Special
